channel.title: David Czarnecki
channel.description: Agora Games. Lead Engineer. Gamer. Foodie. Author. Snowboarder. Beekeeper.

item.title: 2012 in Video Games
item.description:
Here are all the video games I played in 2012:

  • Metro 2033 (360)
  • Gotham City Impostors (360 - XBLA)
  • Syndicate (360)
  • Mass Effect 3 (360)
  • I Am Alive (360 - XBLA)
  • Journey (PS3 - PSN)
  • Fez (360 - XBLA)
  • Prototype 2 (360)
  • Max Payne 3 (360)
  • Lollipop Chainsaw (360)
  • Spec Ops: The Line (360)
  • Deadlight (360 - XBLA)
  • Hybrid (360 - XBLA)
  • Darksiders II (360)
  • Mark of the Ninja (360 - XBLA)
  • Borderlands 2 (360)
  • Dishonored (360)
  • Assassin’s Creed III (360)
  • Halo 4 (360)
  • Call of Duty: Black Ops 2 (360)
  • Hitman: Absolution (360)
  • Far Cry 3 (360)
